00032    /*
00033    * Constructor.
00034    */
00035    Exchanger::Exchanger()
00036     : sendArray_(),
00037       recvArray_(),
00038       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00039       emptyBonds_(),
00040       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00041       emptyAngles_(),
00042       #endif
00043       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00044       emptyDihedrals_(),
00045       #endif
00046       #endif
00047       bound_(),
00048       inner_(),
00049       outer_(),
00050       multiProcessorDirection_(),
00051       boundaryPtr_(0),
00052       domainPtr_(0),
00053       atomStoragePtr_(0),
00054       bondStoragePtr_(0),

00072    /*
00073    * Set pointers to associated objects.
00074    */
00075    void Exchanger::associate(const Domain& domain, 
00076                              const Boundary& boundary, 
00077                              AtomStorage& atomStorage, 
00078                              GroupStorage<2>& bondStorage, 
00079                              #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00080                              GroupStorage<3>& angleStorage, 
00081                              #endif
00082                              #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00083                              GroupStorage<4>& dihedralStorage, 
00084                              #endif
00085                              Buffer& buffer)
00086    {
00087       domainPtr_ = &domain;
00088       boundaryPtr_ = &boundary;
00089       atomStoragePtr_ = &atomStorage;
00090       bondStoragePtr_ = &bondStorage;
00091       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00092       angleStoragePtr_ = &angleStorage;
00093       #endif
00094       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00095       dihedralStoragePtr_ = &dihedralStorage;
00096       #endif
00097       bufferPtr_ = &buffer;
00098    }

00100    /*
00101    * Allocate memory.
00102    */
00103    void Exchanger::allocate()
00104    {
00105       // Preconditions
00106       if (!bufferPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00107          UTIL_THROW("Buffer must be allocated before Exchanger");
00108       }
00109 
00110       int sendRecvCapacity = bufferPtr_->ghostCapacity()/2;
00111 
00112       // Reserve space for all ghost send and recv arrays
00113       int i, j;
00114       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00115          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00116             sendArray_(i, j).reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00117             recvArray_(i, j).reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00118          }
00119       }
00120 
00121       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00122       emptyBonds_.reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00123       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00124       emptyAngles_.reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00125       #endif
00126       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00127       emptyDihedrals_.reserve(sendRecvCapacity);
00128       #endif
00129       #endif
00130    }

00132    /*
00133    * Set slab width used for ghosts.
00134    */
00135    void Exchanger::setPairCutoff(double pairCutoff)
00136    {  pairCutoff_ = pairCutoff; }

00138    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00139 
00142    void Exchanger::exchange()
00143    {
00144       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL && !atomStoragePtr_->isCartesian()) {
00145          UTIL_THROW("Error: Coordinates not Cartesian on entry to exchange");
00146       } 
00147       if (!UTIL_ORTHOGONAL && atomStoragePtr_->isCartesian()) {
00148          UTIL_THROW("Error: Coordinates are Cartesian on entry to exchange");
00149       } 
00150       exchangeAtoms();
00151       exchangeGhosts();
00152    }
00153 
00154    template <int N>
00155    void Exchanger::initGroupGhostPlan (GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00156    {
00157       double coordinate;
00158       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00159       Atom* atomPtr;
00160       int nEx[2];
00161       int nIn;
00162       int nOut;
00163       int i, j, k;
00164       bool choose;
00165 
00166       storage.begin(groupIter);
00167       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00168 
00169          // Compute ghost communication plan for group
00170          groupIter->plan().clearFlags();
00171          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00172             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00173                for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00174                   choose = false;
00175                   nIn = 0;
00176                   nOut = 0;
00177                   nEx[j] = 0;
00178                   for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00179                      atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00180                      if (atomPtr) {
00181                         coordinate = atomPtr->position()[i];
00182                         if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00183                            if (j == 0) {
00184                               assert(inner_(i, j) > bound_(i, j));
00185                               if (coordinate < inner_(i, j)) {
00186                                  ++nOut;
00187                                  if (coordinate < bound_(i, j)) {
00188                                     nEx[j] += 1;
00189                                  }
00190                               }
00191                               if (coordinate > outer_(i, j)) {
00192                                  ++nIn;
00193                               }
00194                            } else {
00195                               assert(inner_(i, j) < bound_(i, j));
00196                               if (coordinate > inner_(i, j)) {
00197                                  ++nOut;
00198                                  if (coordinate > bound_(i, j)) {
00199                                     nEx[j] += 1;
00200                                  }
00201                               }
00202                               if (coordinate < outer_(i, j)) {
00203                                  ++nIn;
00204                               }
00205                            }
00206                         } else { 
00207                            if (atomPtr->plan().exchange(i, j)) {
00208                               ++nOut;
00209                               nEx[j] += 1;
00210                            } else {
00211                               ++nIn;
00212                            }
00213                         }
00214                      } else {
00215                         choose = true;
00216                         break;
00217                      }
00218                   } // end for k
00219                   if (nOut > 0 && nIn > 0) {
00220                      choose = true;
00221                   }
00222                   if (choose) {
00223                      groupIter->plan().setGhost(i, j);
00224                   } else {
00225                      groupIter->plan().clearGhost(i, j);
00226                   }
00227                } // end for j
00228 
00229                #if 0
00230                if (nEx[0] > 0 && nEx[1] > 0) {
00231                   UTIL_THROW("Group spanning 3 nodes");  
00232                }
00233                #endif
00234 
00235             } // end if multiProcessorDirection
00236          } // end for i
00237 
00238          // Clear pointers to all ghost atoms in group
00239          for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00240             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00241             if (atomPtr) {
00242                if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00243                   groupIter->clearAtomPtr(k);
00244                }
00245             }
00246          }
00247 
00248       }
00249    }
00250 
00251    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00252    /*
00253    * Pack groups that contain postmarked atoms.
00254    */
00255    template <int N>
00256    void Exchanger::packGroups(int i, int j, 
00257                               GroupStorage<N>& storage, 
00258                               APArray< Group<N> >& emptyGroups)
00259    {
00260       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00261       Atom* atomPtr;
00262       int k, nAtom;
00263       bool choose;
00264 
00265       bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::GROUP, N);
00266       emptyGroups.clear();
00267       storage.begin(groupIter);
00268       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00269          choose = false;
00270          nAtom = 0;
00271          for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00272             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00273             if (atomPtr) {
00274                if (atomPtr->plan().exchange(i, j)) {
00275                   choose = true;
00276                   groupIter->clearAtomPtr(k);
00277                } else {
00278                   ++nAtom;
00279                }
00280             }
00281          }
00282          if (nAtom == 0) {
00283             emptyGroups.append(*groupIter);
00284          }
00285          if (choose) {
00286             bufferPtr_->packGroup<N>(*groupIter);
00287          }
00288       }
00289       bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
00290    }
00291 
00292    /*
00293    * Remove empty groups from GroupStorage<N>.
00294    */
00295    template <int N>
00296    void Exchanger::removeEmptyGroups(GroupStorage<N>& storage,
00297                                      APArray< Group<N> >& emptyGroups)
00298    {
00299       int nEmpty = emptyGroups.size();
00300       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00301       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00302       // Confirm that groups are actually empty
00303       Atom* atomPtr;
00304       int   atomId;
00305       for (int k = 0; k < nEmpty; ++k) {
00306          for (int m = 0; m < N; ++m) {
00307             atomId = emptyGroups[k].atomId(m);
00308             atomPtr = emptyGroups[k].atomPtr(m);
00309             assert(atomPtr == 0);
00310             assert(atomStoragePtr_->find(atomId) == 0);
00311          }
00312       }
00313       #endif
00314       #endif
00315       for (int k = 0; k < nEmpty; ++k) {
00316          storage.remove(&(emptyGroups[k]));
00317       }
00318    }
00319 
00320    /*
00321    * Unpack groups into bondStorage.
00322    */
00323    template <int N>
00324    void Exchanger::unpackGroups(GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00325    {
00326       Group<N>* newGroupPtr;
00327       Group<N>* oldGroupPtr;
00328       int groupId;
00329 
00330       bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
00331       while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
00332          newGroupPtr = storage.newPtr();
00333          bufferPtr_->unpackGroup<N>(*newGroupPtr);
00334          groupId = newGroupPtr->id();
00335          oldGroupPtr = storage.find(groupId);
00336          if (oldGroupPtr) {
00337             storage.returnPtr();
00338             atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*oldGroupPtr);
00339          } else {
00340             storage.add();
00341             atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*newGroupPtr);
00342          }
00343       }
00344       assert(bufferPtr_->recvSize() == 0);
00345    }
00346    #endif // endif ifdef UTIL_MPI
00347 
00348    /*
00349    * Set ghost communication flags for all atoms in incomplete groups.
00350    */
00351    template <int N>
00352    void Exchanger::finishGroupGhostPlan(GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00353    {
00354       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00355       Atom* atomPtr;
00356       Plan* planPtr;
00357       int i, j, k, nAtom;
00358 
00359       // Loop over groups
00360       storage.begin(groupIter);
00361       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00362 
00363          #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00364          #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00365          // Validate group
00366          int atomId;
00367          nAtom  = 0;
00368          for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00369             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00370             atomId  = groupIter->atomId(k);
00371             if (atomPtr != 0) {
00372                if (atomPtr != atomStoragePtr_->find(atomId)) {
00373                   UTIL_THROW("Error in atom pointer in bond");
00374                }
00375                if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00376                   UTIL_THROW("Pointer to ghost atom in bond");
00377                } else {
00378                   ++nAtom;
00379                }
00380             } else { // if atomPtr == 0
00381                atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->find(atomId);
00382                if (atomPtr) {
00383                   if (!atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00384                      UTIL_THROW("Missing pointer to local atom in bond");
00385                   }
00386                }
00387             }
00388          }
00389          assert(nAtom == groupIter->nPtr());
00390          if (nAtom == 0) {
00391             UTIL_THROW("Empty bond");
00392          }
00393          #endif
00394          #endif
00395 
00396          // If this group is incomplete, set ghost flags for atoms 
00397          nAtom = groupIter->nPtr();
00398          if (nAtom < N) {
00399             for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00400                if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00401                   for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00402                      if (groupIter->plan().ghost(i, j)) {
00403                         for (k = 0; k < N; ++k) {
00404                            atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(k);
00405                            if (atomPtr) {
00406                               assert(!atomPtr->isGhost());
00407                               planPtr = &atomPtr->plan();
00408                               if (!planPtr->ghost(i, j)) { 
00409                                  planPtr->setGhost(i, j);
00410                                  sendArray_(i,j).append(*atomPtr);
00411                               }
00412                            }
00413                         }
00414                      }
00415                   }
00416                }
00417             }
00418          }
00419 
00420       }
00421    }
00422 
00423    /*
00424    * Exchange ownership of local atoms and groups, set ghost plan.
00425    *
00426    * Atomic coordinates must be in generalized coordinates on entry and 
00427    * exit if not UTIL_ORTHOGONAL, and Cartesian if UTIL_ORTHOGONAL.
00428    *
00429    * Algorithm:
00430    *
00431    *    - Loop over local atoms, set exchange and ghost communication 
00432    *      flags for those beyond or near boundaries. 
00433    *
00434    *    - Add local atoms that will be retained by this processor but 
00435    *      sent as ghosts to appropriate send arrays.
00436    *
00437    *    - Loop over groups, set ghost communication flags for groups
00438    *      that span boundaries are have atoms near boundaries.
00439    *
00440    *    - Clear ghosts.
00441    *
00442    *      For each transfer directions (i and j) {
00443    *  
00444    *         for each local atom {
00445    *            if marked for exchange(i, j) {
00446    *               if gridDimension[i] > 1 {
00447    *                  - add to sendAtoms array for removal
00448    *                  - pack into send buffer
00449    *               } else {
00450    *                  - make ghost copy
00451    *               }
00452    *            }
00453    *         }
00454    *
00455    *         if gridDimension[i] > 1 {
00456    *            - Pack groups containing atoms to be sent
00457    *            - Remove exchanged atoms and empty groups
00458    *            - Send and receive data
00459    *            for each atom in receive buffer {
00460    *               - Unpack atom into storage
00461    *               - shift periodic boundary conditions
00462    *               - Determine if this is new home (or way station)
00463    *               - If atom is home, add to appropriate ghost arrays.
00464    *            }
00465    *         }
00466    * 
00467    *      } 
00468    *
00469    *    - Loop over groups, identify incomplete groups. For each
00470    *      atom in an incomplete groups, set all ghost communication
00471    *      flags that are set for the group, and add to send arrays.
00472    *
00473    *  Upon return, each processor owns all atoms in its domain, 
00474    *  and all groups that contain one or more such atoms, all
00475    *  ghost flags are set for local atoms, send arrays contain
00476    *  all local atoms that are marked for sending as ghosts, 
00477    *  and there are no ghosts.
00478    */
00479    void Exchanger::exchangeAtoms()
00480    {
00481       stamp(START);
00482       Vector lengths = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00483       double bound, inner, slabWidth;
00484       double coordinate, rshift;
00485       AtomIterator atomIter;
00486       Atom* atomPtr;
00487       Plan* planPtr;
00488       int i, j, jc, ip, jp, k, source, dest, nSend;
00489       int shift;
00490       bool isHome;
00491       bool isGhost;
00492 
00493       // Set domain and slab boundaries
00494       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00495          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00496             slabWidth = pairCutoff_;
00497          } else {
00498             slabWidth = pairCutoff_/lengths[i];
00499          }
00500          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00501             // j = 0 sends to lower coordinate i, bound is minimum
00502             // j = 1 sends to higher coordinate i, bound is maximum
00503             bound = domainPtr_->domainBound(i, j);
00504             bound_(i, j) = bound;
00505             if (j == 0) { // Communicate with lower index
00506                inner_(i,j) = bound + slabWidth;
00507                outer_(i, j)= bound - slabWidth;
00508             } else { // j == 1, communicate with upper index
00509                inner_(i, j) = bound - slabWidth;
00510                outer_(i, j) = bound + slabWidth;
00511             }
00512             sendArray_(i, j).clear();
00513          }
00514          if (domainPtr_->grid().dimension(i) > 1) {
00515             multiProcessorDirection_[i] = 1;
00516          } else {
00517             multiProcessorDirection_[i] = 0;
00518          }
00519       }
00520 
00521       // Compute communication plan for every local atom
00522       atomStoragePtr_->begin(atomIter);
00523       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00524 
00525          planPtr = &atomIter->plan();
00526          planPtr->clearFlags();
00527          isHome  = true;
00528          isGhost = false;
00529 
00530          // Cartesian directions
00531          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00532   
00533             coordinate = atomIter->position()[i];
00534  
00535             // Transmission direction
00536             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00537    
00538                // j = 0 sends to lower coordinate i
00539                // j = 1 sends to higher coordinate i
00540 
00541                // Index for conjugate (reverse) direction
00542                if (j == 0) jc = 1;
00543                if (j == 1) jc = 0;
00544    
00545                if (j == 0) { // Communicate with lower index
00546                   if (coordinate < bound_(i, j)) {
00547                      planPtr->setExchange(i, j);
00548                      if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00549                         isHome = false;
00550                      }
00551                      if (coordinate > outer_(i, j)) {
00552                         planPtr->setGhost(i, jc);
00553                         isGhost = true;
00554                      }
00555                   } else {
00556                      if (coordinate < inner_(i, j)) {
00557                         planPtr->setGhost(i, j);
00558                         isGhost = true;
00559                      }
00560                   }
00561                } else { // j == 1, communicate with upper index
00562                   if (coordinate > bound_(i, j)) {
00563                      planPtr->setExchange(i, j);
00564                      if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00565                         isHome = false;
00566                      }
00567                      if (coordinate < outer_(i, j)) {
00568                         planPtr->setGhost(i, jc);
00569                         isGhost = true;
00570                      }
00571                   } else {
00572                      if (coordinate > inner_(i, j)) {
00573                         planPtr->setGhost(i, j);
00574                         isGhost = true;
00575                      }
00576                   }
00577                }
00578    
00579             } // end for j
00580          } // end for i
00581 
00582          // Add atoms that will be retained by this processor,
00583          // but will be communicated as ghosts to sendArray_
00584          if (isGhost && isHome) {
00585             for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00586                for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00587                   if (planPtr->ghost(i, j)) {
00588                      sendArray_(i, j).append(*atomIter);
00589                   }
00590                }
00591             }
00592          }
00593 
00594       } // end atom loop, end compute plan
00595       stamp(ATOM_PLAN);
00596 
00597       /*
00598       * Find groups that span boundaries (uses information about ghosts).
00599       * Clear pointers to ghosts in each Group after inspecting the Group.
00600       *
00601       * Atoms in Group<N> objects that span boundaries, and are incomplete
00602       * after atom migration, are marked for sending as ghosts in the
00603       * finishGroupGhostPlan<N> function, further below.
00604       */
00605       initGroupGhostPlan<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);      // bonds
00606       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00607       initGroupGhostPlan<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);     // angles
00608       #endif
00609       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00610       initGroupGhostPlan<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);  // dihedrals
00611       #endif
00612       stamp(INIT_GROUP_PLAN);
00613 
00614       // Clear all ghost atoms from AtomStorage
00615       atomStoragePtr_->clearGhosts();
00616       stamp(CLEAR_GHOSTS);
00617 
00618       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00619       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00620       int nAtomTotal;
00621       atomStoragePtr_->computeNAtomTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00622       int myRank = domainPtr_->gridRank();
00623       if (myRank == 0) {
00624          nAtomTotal = atomStoragePtr_->nAtomTotal();
00625       }
00626       bondStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00627                                domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00628       #endif
00629       #endif
00630 
00631       // Cartesian directions for exchange (0=x, 1=y, 2=z)
00632       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00633 
00634          // Transmission direction
00635          // j = 0 sends to processor with lower grid coordinate i
00636          // j = 1 sends to processor with higher grid coordinate i
00637          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00638 
00639             // Index for conjugate (reverse) direction
00640             if (j == 0) jc = 1;
00641             if (j == 1) jc = 0;
00642 
00643             source = domainPtr_->sourceRank(i, j); // rank to receive from
00644             dest = domainPtr_->destRank(i, j);     // rank to send to
00645             bound = domainPtr_->domainBound(i, j); // bound for send
00646             inner = inner_(i, jc);                 // inner bound upon receipt 
00647             shift = domainPtr_->shift(i, j);       // shift for periodic b.c.
00648             if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00649                rshift = lengths[i]*double(shift);
00650             } else {
00651                rshift = double(shift);
00652             }
00653 
00654             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00655             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00656                bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00657                bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::ATOM);
00658             }
00659             #endif
00660 
00661             // Choose atoms for sending, pack and mark for removal.
00662             sentAtoms_.clear();
00663             atomStoragePtr_->begin(atomIter);
00664             for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00665 
00666                #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00667                coordinate = atomIter->position()[i];
00668                #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00669                {
00670                   bool choose;
00671                   if (j == 0) {
00672                      choose = (coordinate < bound);
00673                   } else {
00674                      choose = (coordinate > bound);
00675                   }
00676                   assert(choose == atomIter->plan().exchange(i, j));
00677                }
00678                #endif
00679                #endif
00680 
00681                if (atomIter->plan().exchange(i, j)) {
00682 
00683                   #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00684                   if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00685 
00686                      sentAtoms_.append(*atomIter);
00687                      bufferPtr_->packAtom(*atomIter);
00688 
00689                   } else 
00690                   #endif
00691                   {
00692 
00693                      #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00694                      #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG 
00695                      assert(shift);
00696                      assert(coordinate > -1.0*fabs(rshift));
00697                      assert(coordinate <  2.0*fabs(rshift));
00698                      #endif
00699                      #endif
00700 
00701                      // Shift position if required by periodic b.c.
00702                      if (shift) {
00703                         atomIter->position()[i] += rshift;
00704                      }
00705 
00706                      #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00707                      coordinate = atomIter->position()[i];
00708                      assert(coordinate >= domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 0));
00709                      assert(coordinate < domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 1));
00710                      #endif
00711 
00712                      // For gridDimension==1, only nonbonded ghosts exist.
00713                      // The following assertion applies to these.
00714                      assert(!atomIter->plan().ghost(i, j));
00715 
00716                      #if UTIL_DEBUG
00717                      // Check ghost communication plan
00718                      if (j == 0 && atomIter->position()[i] > inner) { 
00719                         assert(atomIter->plan().ghost(i, 1));
00720                      } else 
00721                      if (j == 1 && atomIter->position()[i] < inner) {
00722                         assert(atomIter->plan().ghost(i, 0));
00723                      }
00724                      #endif
00725 
00726                   }
00727                }
00728 
00729             } // end atom loop
00730             stamp(PACK_ATOMS);
00731 
00732             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00733             // Send and receive only if processor grid dimension(i) > 1
00734             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
00735 
00736                // End atom send block
00737                bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
00738 
00739                // Pack groups that contain postmarked atoms.
00740                packGroups<2>(i, j, *bondStoragePtr_, emptyBonds_);
00741                #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00742                packGroups<3>(i, j, *angleStoragePtr_, emptyAngles_);
00743                #endif
00744                #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00745                packGroups<4>(i, j, *dihedralStoragePtr_, emptyDihedrals_);
00746                #endif
00747                stamp(PACK_GROUPS);
00748 
00749                /*
00750                * Note: Removal cannot be done within above loops over atoms
00751                * and groups because element removal invalidates the iterators.
00752                */
00753 
00754                // Remove chosen atoms (listed in recvArray) from atomStorage
00755                nSend = sentAtoms_.size();
00756                for (k = 0; k < nSend; ++k) {
00757                   atomStoragePtr_->removeAtom(&sentAtoms_[k]);
00758                }
00759                stamp(REMOVE_ATOMS);
00760      
00761                // Remove empty groups
00762                removeEmptyGroups<2>(*bondStoragePtr_, emptyBonds_);
00763                #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00764                removeEmptyGroups<3>(*angleStoragePtr_, emptyAngles_);
00765                #endif
00766                #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00767                removeEmptyGroups<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_, emptyDihedrals_);
00768                #endif
00769                stamp(REMOVE_GROUPS);
00770 
00771                // Send to processor dest and receive from processor source
00772                bufferPtr_->sendRecv(domainPtr_->communicator(), 
00773                                     source, dest);
00774                stamp(SEND_RECV_ATOMS);
00775 
00776                // Unpack atoms into atomStorage
00777                bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
00778                while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
00779 
00780                   atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->newAtomPtr();
00781                   planPtr = &atomPtr->plan();
00782                   bufferPtr_->unpackAtom(*atomPtr);
00783                   atomStoragePtr_->addNewAtom();
00784 
00785                   if (shift) {
00786                      atomPtr->position()[i] += rshift;
00787                   }
00788 
00789                   #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00790                   // Check bounds on atom coordinate
00791                   coordinate = atomPtr->position()[i];
00792                   assert(coordinate > domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 0));
00793                   assert(coordinate < domainPtr_->domainBound(i, 1));
00794 
00795                   // Check ghost plan
00796                   assert(!planPtr->ghost(i, j));
00797                   if (j == 0) {
00798                      assert(planPtr->ghost(i, 1) == (coordinate > inner) );
00799                   } else {
00800                      assert(planPtr->ghost(i, 0) == (coordinate < inner) );
00801                   }
00802                   #endif
00803 
00804                   // Determine if new atom will stay on this processor.
00805                   isHome = true;
00806                   if (i < Dimension - 1) {
00807                      for (ip = i + 1; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
00808                         if (multiProcessorDirection_[ip]) {
00809                            for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
00810                               if (planPtr->exchange(ip, jp)) {
00811                                  isHome = false;
00812                               }
00813                            }
00814                         }
00815                     }
00816                   }
00817 
00818                   // If atom will stay, add to sendArrays for ghosts
00819                   if (isHome) {
00820                      for (ip = 0; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
00821                         for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
00822                            if (planPtr->ghost(ip, jp)) {
00823                               sendArray_(ip, jp).append(*atomPtr);
00824                            }
00825                         }
00826                      }
00827                   }
00828 
00829                }
00830                assert(bufferPtr_->recvSize() == 0);
00831                stamp(UNPACK_ATOMS);
00832 
00833                // Unpack groups
00834                unpackGroups<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);
00835                #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00836                unpackGroups<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);
00837                #endif
00838                #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00839                unpackGroups<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);
00840                #endif
00841                stamp(UNPACK_GROUPS);
00842 
00843             } // end if gridDimension > 1
00844             #endif // ifdef UTIL_MPI
00845 
00846          } // end for j (direction 0, 1)
00847       } // end for i (Cartesian index)
00848 
00849       /*
00850       * At this point:
00851       * No ghost atoms exist.
00852       * All atoms are on correct processor.
00853       * No Groups are empty.
00854       * All pointer to local atoms in Groups are set.
00855       * All pointers to ghost atoms in Groups are null.
00856       */
00857 
00858       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00859       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00860       // Validity checks
00861       atomStoragePtr_->computeNAtomTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00862       if (myRank == 0) {
00863          assert(nAtomTotal = atomStoragePtr_->nAtomTotal());
00864       }
00865       atomStoragePtr_->isValid();
00866       bondStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00867                                domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00868       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00869       angleStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00870                                 domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00871       #endif
00872       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00873       dihedralStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
00874                                    domainPtr_->communicator(), false);
00875       #endif
00876       #endif
00877       #endif
00878 
00879       // Set ghost communication flags for atoms in incomplete groups
00880       finishGroupGhostPlan<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);
00881       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00882       finishGroupGhostPlan<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);
00883       #endif
00884       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00885       finishGroupGhostPlan<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);
00886       #endif
00887 
00888       stamp(FINISH_GROUP_PLAN);
00889    }
00890 
00891    /*
00892    * Find all ghost members of groups at the end of exchangeGhosts.
00893    */
00894    template <int N>
00895    void Exchanger::findGroupGhosts(GroupStorage<N>& storage)
00896    {
00897       GroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00898       int nAtom;
00899       storage.begin(groupIter);
00900       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00901          nAtom = groupIter->nPtr();
00902          if (nAtom < N) {
00903             nAtom = atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*groupIter);
00904             if (nAtom < N) {
00905                UTIL_THROW("Incomplete group after search for ghosts");
00906             }
00907          }
00908       }
00909    }
00910 
00911    /*
00912    * Exchange ghost atoms.
00913    *
00914    * Call immediately after exchangeAtoms and before rebuilding the 
00915    * neighbor list on time steps that require reneighboring. Uses
00916    * ghost communication plans computed in exchangeAtoms.
00917    */
00918    void Exchanger::exchangeGhosts()
00919    {
00920       stamp(START);
00921 
00922       // Preconditions
00923       assert(bufferPtr_->isInitialized());
00924       assert(domainPtr_->isInitialized());
00925       assert(domainPtr_->hasBoundary());
00926       if (atomStoragePtr_->nGhost() != 0) {
00927          UTIL_THROW("atomStoragePtr_->nGhost() != 0");
00928       }
00929 
00930       Vector  lengths = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00931       double  rshift;
00932       Atom* atomPtr;
00933       Atom* sendPtr;
00934       int i, j, jc, ip, jp, k, source, dest, shift, size;
00935 
00936       // Clear all receive arrays
00937       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00938          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00939             recvArray_(i, j).clear();
00940          }
00941       }
00942 
00943       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00944       double coordinate;
00945       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
00946       // Check send arrays
00947       {
00948          // Count local atoms marked for sending as ghosts.
00949          FMatrix<int, Dimension, 2> sendCounter;
00950          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00951             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00952                sendCounter(i, j) = 0;
00953             }
00954          }
00955          AtomIterator  localIter;
00956          Plan* planPtr;
00957          atomStoragePtr_->begin(localIter);
00958          for ( ; localIter.notEnd(); ++localIter) {
00959             planPtr = &localIter->plan();
00960             for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00961                for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00962                   if (planPtr->ghost(i, j)) {
00963                       ++sendCounter(i, j);
00964                   }
00965                }
00966             }
00967          }
00968          // Check consistency of counts with sendArray sizes.
00969          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00970             for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00971                if (sendCounter(i, j) != sendArray_(i, j).size()) {
00972                   UTIL_THROW("Incorrect sendArray size");
00973                }
00974             }
00975          }
00976       }
00977       #endif
00978       #endif
00979       stamp(INIT_SEND_ARRAYS);
00980 
00981       // Cartesian directions
00982       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00983 
00984          // Transmit directions
00985          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00986 
00987             // j = 0: Send ghosts near minimum bound to lower coordinate
00988             // j = 1: Send ghosts near maximum bound to higher coordinate
00989 
00990             // Set index for reverse direction
00991             if (j == 0) jc = 1;
00992             if (j == 1) jc = 0;
00993 
00994             // Shift on receiving node for periodic b.c.s
00995             shift = domainPtr_->shift(i, j);
00996             if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00997                rshift = lengths[i]*shift;
00998             } else {
00999                rshift = 1.0*shift;
01000             }
01001 
01002             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
01003             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
01004                bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
01005                bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::GHOST);
01006             }
01007             #endif
01008 
01009             // Pack atoms in sendArray_(i, j)
01010             size = sendArray_(i, j).size();
01011             for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01012 
01013                sendPtr = &sendArray_(i, j)[k];
01014 
01015                #ifdef UTIL_MPI
01016                if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
01017 
01018                   // If grid dimension > 1, pack atom for sending 
01019                   bufferPtr_->packGhost(*sendPtr);
01020 
01021                } else 
01022                #endif
01023                {  // if grid dimension == 1
01024 
01025                   // Make a ghost copy of local atom on this processor
01026                   atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->newGhostPtr();
01027                   recvArray_(i, j).append(*atomPtr);
01028                   atomPtr->setId(sendPtr->id());
01029                   atomPtr->setTypeId(sendPtr->typeId());
01030                   atomPtr->plan().setFlags(sendPtr->plan().flags());
01031                   atomPtr->position() = sendPtr->position();
01032                   if (shift) {
01033                      atomPtr->position()[i] += rshift;
01034                   }
01035                   atomStoragePtr_->addNewGhost();
01036 
01037                   #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
01038                   // Validate shifted ghost coordinate 
01039                   coordinate = atomPtr->position()[i];
01040                   if (j == 0) {
01041                      assert(coordinate > bound_(i, 1));
01042                   } else {
01043                      assert(coordinate < bound_(i, 0));
01044                   }
01045                   #endif
01046 
01047                   // Add to send arrays for any remaining directions
01048                   if (i < Dimension - 1) {
01049                      for (ip = i + 1; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
01050                         for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
01051                            if (atomPtr->plan().ghost(ip, jp)) {
01052                               sendArray_(ip, jp).append(*atomPtr);
01053                            }
01054                         }
01055                      }
01056                   }
01057 
01058                }
01059 
01060             }
01061             stamp(PACK_GHOSTS);
01062 
01063             #ifdef UTIL_MPI
01064             // Send and receive buffers
01065             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
01066 
01067                bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
01068 
01069                source = domainPtr_->sourceRank(i, j);
01070                dest   = domainPtr_->destRank(i, j);
01071                bufferPtr_->sendRecv(domainPtr_->communicator(), source, dest);
01072                stamp(SEND_RECV_GHOSTS);
01073 
01074                // Unpack ghosts and add to recvArray
01075                bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
01076                while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
01077 
01078                   atomPtr = atomStoragePtr_->newGhostPtr();
01079                   bufferPtr_->unpackGhost(*atomPtr);
01080                   if (shift) {
01081                      atomPtr->position()[i] += rshift;
01082                   }
01083                   recvArray_(i, j).append(*atomPtr);
01084                   atomStoragePtr_->addNewGhost();
01085 
01086                   // Prohibit sending back ghost in reverse direction
01087                   if (j == 0) {
01088                      atomPtr->plan().clearGhost(i, 1);
01089                   }
01090 
01091                   // Add to send arrays for remaining directions
01092                   if (i < Dimension - 1) {
01093                      for (ip = i + 1; ip < Dimension; ++ip) {
01094                         for (jp = 0; jp < 2; ++jp) {
01095                            if (atomPtr->plan().ghost(ip, jp)) {
01096                               sendArray_(ip, jp).append(*atomPtr);
01097                            }
01098                         }
01099                      }
01100                   }
01101 
01102                   #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
01103                   // Validate ghost coordinate on the receiving processor.
01104                   coordinate = atomPtr->position()[i];
01105                   if (j == 0) {
01106                      assert(coordinate > bound_(i, 1));
01107                   } else {
01108                      assert(coordinate < bound_(i, 0));
01109                   }
01110                   #endif
01111 
01112                }
01113                stamp(UNPACK_GHOSTS);
01114 
01115             }
01116             #endif // ifdef UTIL_MPI
01117 
01118          } // end for transmit direction j = 0, 1
01119 
01120       } // end for Cartesian index i
01121 
01122 
01123       // Find ghost atoms for all incomplete bonds
01124       findGroupGhosts<2>(*bondStoragePtr_);
01125       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
01126       findGroupGhosts<3>(*angleStoragePtr_);
01127       #endif
01128       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
01129       findGroupGhosts<4>(*dihedralStoragePtr_);
01130       #endif
01131 
01132       #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
01133       #ifdef EXCHANGER_DEBUG
01134       atomStoragePtr_->isValid();
01135       bondStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, 
01136                                domainPtr_->communicator(), true);
01137       #endif
01138       #endif
01139 
01140       stamp(FIND_GROUP_GHOSTS);
01141    }
01142 
01143    /*
01144    * Update ghost atom coordinates.
01145    *
01146    * Call on time steps for which no reneighboring is required. 
01147    */
01148    void Exchanger::update()
01149    {
01150       stamp(START);
01151       if (!atomStoragePtr_->isCartesian()) {
01152          UTIL_THROW("Error: Coordinates not Cartesian on entry to update");
01153       } 
01154 
01155       Vector lengths = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
01156       Atom*  atomPtr;
01157       int    i, j, k, source, dest, size, shift;
01158 
01159       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
01160          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
01161 
01162             // Shift on receiving processor for periodic boundary conditions
01163             shift = domainPtr_->shift(i, j);
01164 
01165             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
01166 
01167                // Pack ghost positions for sending
01168                bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
01169                bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::UPDATE);
01170                size = sendArray_(i, j).size();
01171                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01172                   bufferPtr_->packUpdate(sendArray_(i, j)[k]);
01173                }
01174                bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
01175                stamp(PACK_UPDATE);
01176   
01177                // Send and receive buffers
01178                source = domainPtr_->sourceRank(i, j);
01179                dest   = domainPtr_->destRank(i, j);
01180                bufferPtr_->sendRecv(domainPtr_->communicator(), source, dest);
01181                stamp(SEND_RECV_UPDATE);
01182    
01183                // Unpack ghost positions
01184                bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
01185                size = recvArray_(i, j).size();
01186                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01187                   atomPtr = &recvArray_(i, j)[k];
01188                   bufferPtr_->unpackUpdate(*atomPtr);
01189                   if (shift) {
01190                      boundaryPtr_->applyShift(atomPtr->position(), i, shift);
01191                   }
01192                }
01193                stamp(UNPACK_UPDATE);
01194 
01195             } else {
01196 
01197                // If grid().dimension(i) == 1, then copy positions of atoms
01198                // listed in sendArray to those listed in the recvArray.
01199 
01200                size = sendArray_(i, j).size();
01201                assert(size == recvArray_(i, j).size());
01202                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01203                   atomPtr = &recvArray_(i, j)[k];
01204                   atomPtr->position() = sendArray_(i, j)[k].position();
01205                   if (shift) {
01206                      boundaryPtr_->applyShift(atomPtr->position(), i, shift);
01207                   }
01208                }
01209                stamp(LOCAL_UPDATE);
01210 
01211             }
01212 
01213          } // transmit direction j = 0, 1
01214 
01215       } // Cartesian direction i = 0, ..., Dimension - 1
01216 
01217    }
01218 
01219    /*
01220    * Update ghost atom forces.
01221    *
01222    * Call on time steps for which no reneighboring is required,
01223    * if reverse communication is enabled.
01224    */
01225    void Exchanger::reverseUpdate()
01226    {
01227       stamp(START);
01228       Vector lengths = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
01229       Atom*  atomPtr;
01230       int    i, j, k, source, dest, size;
01231 
01232       for (i = Dimension - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
01233          for (j = 1; j >= 0; --j) {
01234 
01235             if (multiProcessorDirection_[i]) {
01236 
01237                // Pack ghost forces for sending
01238                bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
01239                bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::FORCE);
01240                size = recvArray_(i, j).size();
01241                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01242                   bufferPtr_->packForce(recvArray_(i, j)[k]);
01243                }
01244                bufferPtr_->endSendBlock();
01245                stamp(PACK_FORCE);
01246   
01247                // Send and receive buffers (reverse direction)
01248                source  = domainPtr_->destRank(i, j);
01249                dest    = domainPtr_->sourceRank(i, j);
01250                bufferPtr_->sendRecv(domainPtr_->communicator(), 
01251                                     source, dest);
01252                stamp(SEND_RECV_FORCE);
01253    
01254                // Unpack ghost forces
01255                bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
01256                size = sendArray_(i, j).size();
01257                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01258                   atomPtr = &sendArray_(i, j)[k];
01259                   bufferPtr_->unpackForce(*atomPtr);
01260                }
01261                stamp(UNPACK_FORCE);
01262 
01263             } else {
01264 
01265                // If grid().dimension(i) == 1, then copy forces of atoms
01266                // listed in sendArray to those listed in the recvArray.
01267 
01268                size = recvArray_(i, j).size();
01269                assert(size == sendArray_(i, j).size());
01270                for (k = 0; k < size; ++k) {
01271                   atomPtr = &sendArray_(i, j)[k];
01272                   atomPtr->force() += recvArray_(i, j)[k].force();
01273                }
01274                stamp(LOCAL_FORCE);
01275 
01276             }
01277 
01278          } // transmit direction j = 1 or 0 
01279 
01280       } // Cartesian direction i 
01281 
01282    }
01283 
01284    /*
01285    * Output statistics.
01286    */
01287    void Exchanger::outputStatistics(std::ostream& out, double time, int nStep)
01288    {
01289       if (domainPtr_->isMaster()) {
01290 
01291          int nAtomTot = atomStoragePtr_->nAtomTotal();
01292          int nProc = 1;
01293          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
01294          nProc = domainPtr_->communicator().Get_size();
01295          #endif
01296 
01297          double ratio = double(nProc)/double(nStep*nAtomTot);
01298 
01299          out << std::endl;
01300          double AtomPlanT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::ATOM_PLAN);
01301          out << "AtomPlan              " << Dbl(AtomPlanT*ratio, 12, 6)
01302              << " sec   " << Dbl(AtomPlanT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01303          double InitGroupPlanT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::INIT_GROUP_PLAN);
01304          out << "InitGroupPlan         " << Dbl(InitGroupPlanT*ratio, 12, 6)
01305              << " sec   " << Dbl(InitGroupPlanT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01306          double ClearGhostsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::CLEAR_GHOSTS);
01307          out << "ClearGhosts           " << Dbl(ClearGhostsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01308              << " sec   " << Dbl(ClearGhostsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01309          double PackAtomsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::PACK_ATOMS);
01310          out << "PackAtoms             " << Dbl(PackAtomsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01311              << " sec   " << Dbl(PackAtomsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01312          double PackGroupsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::PACK_GROUPS);
01313          out << "PackGroups            " << Dbl(PackGroupsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01314              << " sec   " << Dbl(PackGroupsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01315          double RemoveAtomsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::REMOVE_ATOMS);
01316          out << "RemoveAtoms           " << Dbl(RemoveAtomsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01317              << " sec   " << Dbl(RemoveAtomsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01318          double RemoveGroupsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::REMOVE_GROUPS);
01319          out << "RemoveGroups          " << Dbl(RemoveGroupsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01320              << " sec   " << Dbl(RemoveGroupsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01321          double SendRecvAtomsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::SEND_RECV_ATOMS);
01322          out << "SendRecvAtoms         " << Dbl(SendRecvAtomsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01323              << " sec   " << Dbl(SendRecvAtomsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01324          double UnpackAtomsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::UNPACK_ATOMS);
01325          out << "UnpackAtoms           " << Dbl(UnpackAtomsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01326              << " sec   " << Dbl(UnpackAtomsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01327          double UnpackGroupsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::UNPACK_GROUPS);
01328          out << "UnpackGroups          " << Dbl(UnpackGroupsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01329              << " sec   " << Dbl(UnpackGroupsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01330          double FinishGroupPlanT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::FINISH_GROUP_PLAN);
01331          out << "FinishGroupPlan       " << Dbl(FinishGroupPlanT*ratio, 12, 6)
01332              << " sec   " << Dbl(FinishGroupPlanT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01333          double SendArraysT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::INIT_SEND_ARRAYS);
01334          out << "SendArrays            " << Dbl(SendArraysT*ratio, 12, 6)
01335              << " sec   " << Dbl(SendArraysT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01336          double PackGhostsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::PACK_GHOSTS);
01337          out << "PackGhosts            " << Dbl(PackGhostsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01338              << " sec   " << Dbl(PackGhostsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01339          double SendRecvGhostsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::SEND_RECV_GHOSTS);
01340          out << "SendRecvGhosts        " << Dbl(SendRecvGhostsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01341              << " sec   " << Dbl(SendRecvGhostsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01342          double UnpackGhostsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::UNPACK_GHOSTS);
01343          out << "UnpackGhosts          " << Dbl(UnpackGhostsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01344              << " sec   " << Dbl(UnpackGhostsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01345          double FindGroupGhostsT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::FIND_GROUP_GHOSTS);
01346          out << "FindGroupGhosts       " << Dbl(FindGroupGhostsT*ratio, 12, 6)
01347              << " sec   " << Dbl(FindGroupGhostsT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01348          double PackUpdateT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::PACK_UPDATE);
01349          out << "PackUpdate            " << Dbl(PackUpdateT*ratio, 12, 6)
01350              << " sec   " << Dbl(PackUpdateT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01351          double SendRecvUpdateT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::SEND_RECV_UPDATE);
01352          out << "SendRecvUpdate        " << Dbl(SendRecvUpdateT*ratio, 12, 6)
01353              << " sec   " << Dbl(SendRecvUpdateT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01354          double UnpackUpdateT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::UNPACK_UPDATE);
01355          out << "UnpackUpdate          " << Dbl(UnpackUpdateT*ratio, 12, 6)
01356              << " sec   " << Dbl(UnpackUpdateT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01357          double LocalUpdateT =  timer_.time(Exchanger::LOCAL_UPDATE);
01358          out << "LocalUpdate           " << Dbl(LocalUpdateT*ratio, 12, 6)
01359              << " sec   " << Dbl(LocalUpdateT/time, 12, 6, true) << std::endl;
01360          out << std::endl;

01362       }
